metadata.dc:author: Fernández-Nogueras Jiménez, F J
Esquivias Lopéz-Cuervo, J J
metadata.dc:description: At the moment the use of quantitative techniques in anatomopathology is more and more frequent. In this study the authors use for the first time the morpho-photometry approach in epidermoid carcinomas of the larynx coming from filed material. In this way they are checking if this method adds anything to conventional anatomopathology.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio morfofotométrico del carcinoma epidermoide de laringe.
[A morpho-photometric study of laryngeal epidermoid carcinoma].
